interactivity.requirements: 15 Maya Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " You and Me " from Maya Makinami
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Maya at the School Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Maya suggests that Sensei follow her to a takoyaki stall and and buy her dinner. After getting her meal, she tells Sensei that he is "changing too quickly", and doing things that he isn't supposed to. She says that something confusing will happen soon. She asks him what he thinks would happen if the repeating cycles she talked about converged into one, leaving him to handle the memories of every past lifetime at once. He says that he can't know unless it happens, and after she expresses surprise that he didn't call her crazy or joke about it, she says that wasn't a horrible answer.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.5.
